page.title: 04Dalton Piercy
page.content:
{Dalton Piercy}is a small village,even smaller than{Elwick,}about half a mile from the{A19}road and one mile south of{Elwick}.You can reach it by an unclassified road,or a foot path over the fields from{Elwick. Dalton}is a quiet village with the village hall just behind the houses on the south side of the green. The village has a pond on the green with ducks on,but vandals have been taking the ducks and their eggs away.
{ Dalton}doesn't have a shop,or a public house,or a school or a church or a regular bus service. The nearest public house is half a mile away. There is a public telephone box on the green, but the green has few trees on it, which we think makes it less attractive than{Elwick.
